thread.title: New iMacs feature Retina display upgrades, Magic Mouse 2 unveiled
thread.title_full: New iMacs feature Retina display upgrades, Magic Mouse 2 unveiled

title: New iMacs feature Retina display upgrades, Magic Mouse 2 unveiled
text:
New iMacs feature Retina display upgrades, Magic Mouse 2 unveiled Apple renews commitment to desktop format with quiet unveiling POSTED: 02:08 PM CDT Oct 13, 2015 UPDATED: 02:24 PM CDT Oct 13, 2015 
Apple's latest iMacs include upgrades to Retina technology across multiple models and a new Magic Mouse. Related Content 
Apple confirmed its Retina 4K screen is coming to the 21.5-inch iMac for the first time and that Retina 5K displays will come with every 27-inch iMac. 
Previously the 4K displays were only available on top-of-the-line models. 
Also introduced were a new a lineup of accessories including the Magic Mouse 2 and Magic Keyboard. 
Apple claims the keyboard will take up 13 percent less space on a desktop, while the mouse is "lighter, sturdier" with a "smoother glide." Distributed by LAKANA.
